mapper.insert: insert into eatery(name, content, area, categoryId) values(#{name}, #{content},#{area},#{categoryId})
mapper.select: SELECT e.*, c.name as categoryName FROM eatery as e right join category as c on e.categoryId = c.id where c.id = e.categoryId
SELECT e.*, c.name as categoryName FROM eatery as e right join category as c on e.categoryId = c.id where c.id = e.categoryId and e.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')
mapper.update: UPDATE eatery SET name =#{name}, content =#{content}, address=#{address}, phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber}, area=#{area} WHERE id =#{id}
